text: Church of Misery (チャーチ・オブ・ミザリー Chāchi obu Mizarī?) is a doom metal band from Tokyo, Japan. Most of their songs are about serial killers. Their first album was released in 2001. ==References== Category:1995 establishments in Japan Category:Doom metal bands Category:Japanese heavy metal bands Category:Musical groups established in 1995
title: Church of Misery
